revised_title: A Study of the "Fine" Vessels Associated with Lymphatics in the Cod
tldr: The author examines the "fine" vessels associated with the lymphatics in the cod fish (Gadus morrhua) and their connections to the blood vessels and lymphatics. They describe the distribution of these vessels in the cod, their structure, and their relationship to the arterial system. The study provides insights into the lymphatic and circulatory systems in Teleosteans.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Anatomy and Physiology
